events.name: Sanctions on North Korean citizens by South Korea, December 2023
events.wd_label: Sanctions on North Korean citizens by South Korea, December 2023
events.wd_description: South Korea sanctioned eight North Korean citizens linked to nuclear and missile development through arms trade, cyberattacks, and other illicit activities, following a recent intercontinental ballistic missile test by North Korea.
events.description: South Korea sanctioned eight North Korean citizens linked to nuclear and missile development through arms trade, cyberattacks, and other illicit activities, following a recent intercontinental ballistic missile test by North Korea.

events.name: Recent missile test by North Korea
events.wd_label: Recent missile test by North Korea
events.wd_description: North Korea recently fired an intercontinental ballistic missile, an action condemned by South Korea and the United States as a violation of UN Security Council resolutions.
events.description: North Korea recently fired an intercontinental ballistic missile, an action condemned by South Korea and the United States as a violation of UN Security Council resolutions.

events.name: Sanctioned individuals and entities
events.wd_description: South Korea sanctioned eight North Korean individuals, including Ri Chang Ho and Yun Chol, for their involvement in nuclear development, arms trade, and cyberattacks.
events.description: South Korea sanctioned eight North Korean individuals, including Ri Chang Ho and Yun Chol, for their involvement in nuclear development, arms trade, and cyberattacks.

events.name: International response and condemnation
events.wd_description: The missile test and subsequent sanctions were strongly condemned by South Korea and the United States, as part of ongoing international efforts to curb North Korea's weapons program.
events.description: The missile test and subsequent sanctions were strongly condemned by South Korea and the United States, as part of ongoing international efforts to curb North Korea's weapons program.

events.name: Volcanic eruption on the Reykjanes peninsula, Iceland, December 2023
events.wd_label: Volcanic eruption on the Reykjanes peninsula, Iceland, December 2023
events.wd_description: A volcanic eruption occurred on the Reykjanes peninsula in south-west Iceland following weeks of heightened earthquake activity, leading to the evacuation of Grindavik and the spread of fumes to Reykjavik.
events.description: A volcanic eruption occurred on the Reykjanes peninsula in south-west Iceland following weeks of heightened earthquake activity, leading to the evacuation of Grindavik and the spread of fumes to Reykjavik.

events.name: Earthquake activity in Iceland
events.wd_description: The region surrounding Reykjavik experienced a significant increase in earthquake activity since late October, leading to expectations of volcanic activity.
events.description: The region surrounding Reykjavik experienced a significant increase in earthquake activity since late October, leading to expectations of volcanic activity.

events.name: Volcanic eruption
events.wd_description: The volcanic eruption on the Reykjanes peninsula occurred on Monday, with lava flow threatening nearby areas and fumes reaching Reykjavik by Tuesday evening.
events.description: The volcanic eruption on the Reykjanes peninsula occurred on Monday, with lava flow threatening nearby areas and fumes reaching Reykjavik by Tuesday evening.

events.name: Impact on local population and infrastructure
events.wd_label: Impact on local population and infrastructure
events.wd_description: Around 4,000 people were evacuated from Grindavik, but disruptions were minimized, with assurances that the eruption would not impact flights or broader activities in Iceland.
events.description: Around 4,000 people were evacuated from Grindavik, but disruptions were minimized, with assurances that the eruption would not impact flights or broader activities in Iceland.

events.name: EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The detailed process of the EV battery supply chain including various stages such as raw material extraction, production, and recycling.
events.description: The detailed process of the EV battery supply chain including various stages such as raw material extraction, production, and recycling.

events.name: Raw material extraction
events.wd_description: Involves the mining and processing of materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel required for EV batteries.
events.description: Involves the mining and processing of materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel required for EV batteries.

events.name: Lithium mining
events.wd_description: The process of extracting lithium from the earth which is used as a key component in EV batteries.
events.description: The process of extracting lithium from the earth which is used as a key component in EV batteries.

events.name: Cobalt mining
events.wd_description: The extraction of cobalt which is a crucial element in the cathode of EV batteries.
events.description: The extraction of cobalt which is a crucial element in the cathode of EV batteries.

events.name: Nickel mining
events.wd_description: The process of mining nickel which is used to enhance the energy density and longevity of EV batteries.
events.description: The process of mining nickel which is used to enhance the energy density and longevity of EV batteries.

events.name: Production
events.wd_description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries including cell production and assembly.
events.description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries including cell production and assembly.

events.name: Cell production
events.wd_description: The process of producing individual battery cells from raw materials.
events.description: The process of producing individual battery cells from raw materials.

events.name: Assembly
events.wd_description: The assembly of battery cells into battery packs which are then installed into EVs.
events.description: The assembly of battery cells into battery packs which are then installed into EVs.

events.name: Recycling
events.wd_description: The methods used to recycle EV batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce environmental impact.
events.description: The methods used to recycle EV batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce environmental impact.

events.name: Pyrometallurgical recycling
events.wd_description: A recycling method that uses high temperatures to recover metals from spent batteries.
events.description: A recycling method that uses high temperatures to recover metals from spent batteries.

events.name: Hydrometallurgical recycling
events.wd_description: A recycling method that uses aqueous solutions to extract metals from batteries.
events.description: A recycling method that uses aqueous solutions to extract metals from batteries.

events.name: Direct recycling
events.wd_description: A method that recycles battery components directly without breaking them down into their elemental forms.
events.description: A method that recycles battery components directly without breaking them down into their elemental forms.

events.name: Honda and Mitsubishi EV Battery Business Exploration
events.wd_label: Honda and Mitsubishi EV Battery Business Exploration
events.wd_description: Honda Motor and Mitsubishi Corp have signed a pact to explore new businesses using electric vehicle batteries, focusing on energy management and smart charging technologies.
events.description: Honda Motor and Mitsubishi Corp have signed a pact to explore new businesses using electric vehicle batteries, focusing on energy management and smart charging technologies.

events.name: Memorandum of Understanding
events.wd_description: Honda and Mitsubishi have signed a memorandum of understanding to explore business opportunities using EV batteries, including monitoring and repurposing.
events.description: Honda and Mitsubishi have signed a memorandum of understanding to explore business opportunities using EV batteries, including monitoring and repurposing.

events.name: Energy Management Approach
events.wd_description: Honda plans to proactively use EV batteries for energy management, utilizing them as an energy source beyond vehicle use.
events.description: Honda plans to proactively use EV batteries for energy management, utilizing them as an energy source beyond vehicle use.

events.name: Battery Monitoring Business
events.wd_description: The companies will set up a business to monitor the usage of Honda's mini-EV model batteries.
events.description: The companies will set up a business to monitor the usage of Honda's mini-EV model batteries.

events.name: Stationary Energy Storage
events.wd_description: The companies will explore transferring auto batteries to stationary energy storage applications.
events.description: The companies will explore transferring auto batteries to stationary energy storage applications.

events.name: Smart Charging and Vehicle to Grid Systems
events.wd_label: Smart Charging and Vehicle to Grid Systems
events.wd_description: Honda and Mitsubishi will cooperate on smart charging and Vehicle to Grid systems to improve efficiency and reduce electricity costs for customers.
events.description: Honda and Mitsubishi will cooperate on smart charging and Vehicle to Grid systems to improve efficiency and reduce electricity costs for customers.

events.name: Smart Charging Technology
events.wd_description: The companies will develop technology to automatically adjust EV charging times for better efficiency.
events.description: The companies will develop technology to automatically adjust EV charging times for better efficiency.

events.name: Vehicle to Grid Technology
events.wd_description: The companies will develop a system to supply electricity stored in EVs back to the grid.
events.description: The companies will develop a system to supply electricity stored in EVs back to the grid.
